views.markdown:
Quick update for iOS 11 compatibility.. iOS 9 - 11.3.1 is now supported. Remember has been updated for iOS 11 too.. The little lock bug, introduced by iOS changes in iOS 10 is fixed! By the way, AE+ should be updated by the time Cydia purcheses are approved on iOS 10.
Sorry, I messed up version 1.0.3, trying to add in some features from our Pro Package AE+ Airplane Enhancer+ AE v1.0.4 has been reverted back into the battery saving technique that requires Activator to schedule AE on and off durations. You are still able to quickly de-activate Airplane Mode by opening any Apple app!

Tidied up scheduling, removed un-needed time allowances.
Optimised for iOS 9.3.3
Testing compatibility with iOS 7&8 (if you would like to test compatibility with either iOS7 or 8, please email RJTweaks@outlook.com)

Re-released, STILL FREE TO ALL USERS!

Please check out our PRO version with more settings, schedules & profiles "Stand Alone" via the tweak's settings.
